TrackMe - Class in org.piwik.sdk
This objects represents one query to Piwik.
TrackMe() - Constructor for class org.piwik.sdk.TrackMe
 
trackNewAppDownload(Context, Tracker.ExtraIdentifier) - Method in class org.piwik.sdk.Tracker
Track a download for a specific app

Resulting download url:

Case Tracker.ExtraIdentifier.APK_CHECKSUM: http://packageName:versionCode/apk-md5-checksum

Case Tracker.ExtraIdentifier.INSTALLER_PACKAGENAME: http://packageName:versionCode/installerPackageName

Note: Usually the installer-packagename is something like "com.android.vending" (Google Play), but users can modify this value, don't be surprised by some random values.
